briefTitle: Assessment of the Safety and Efficacy of RGN-259 Ophthalmic Solutions for Dry Eye Syndrome : ARISE-2

outcomeMeasures.title: Ocular Discomfort
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from Baseline at Day 29 using the Ora Calibra® Ocular Discomfort Scale (6-point scale where 0 = none and 5 = worst)

outcomeMeasures.title: Corneal Fluorescein Staining
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from Baseline at Day 29 using the Ora Calibra® scale (5-point scale with half (0.5) increments where 0 = none and 4 = severe)

outcomeMeasures.title: Corneal Fluorescein Staining
outcomeMeasures.description: Comparing each of active group \& Placebo.

outcomeMeasures.title: Unanesthetized Schirmer's Test
outcomeMeasures.description: Comparing each of active group \& Placebo.

outcomeMeasures.title: Ocular Surface Disease Index (OSDI)©
outcomeMeasures.description: Comparing each of active group \& Placebo.

outcomeMeasures.title: Tear Film Break-Up Time
outcomeMeasures.description: Comparing each of active group \& Placebo.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Biomicroscopy Using the Slit-lamp
Change in Biomicroscopy Using the Undilated Fundoscopy
